sports.heading: What is basketball?
sports.description: Basketball is a team sport in which two teams, most commonly of five players each, opposing one another on a rectangular court, compete with the primary objective of shooting a basketball through the defender's hoop while preventing the opposing team from shooting through their own hoop.

sports.heading: What is cycling?
sports.description: Cycling, also called bicycling or biking, is the use of bicycles for transport, recreation, exercise or sport. People engaged in cycling are referred to as "cyclists", "bicyclists", or "bikers".

sports.heading: A complete beginner's guide to yoga and its health benefits
sports.description: Derived from the Sanskrit word "yuji," meaning yoke or union, yoga is an ancient practice that brings together mind and body.

sports.heading: What is ice hockey?
sports.description: Ice hockey is a contact team sport played on ice, usually in an indoor or outdoor rink, in which two teams of skaters use their sticks to shoot a vulcanized rubber puck into their opponent's net to score goals.

sports.heading: What is American football?
sports.description: American football, referred to simply as football in the United States and Canada and also known as gridiron, is a team sport played by two teams of eleven players on a rectangular field with goalposts at each end.
